tool_description: Processes and catalogs photographic evidence from incident scenes, ensuring proper metadata, chain of custody, and image integrity verification.

incident_id.description: Unique incident identifier to associate photos with

photographer_name.description: Name of person who took the photographs

photo_descriptions.description: Descriptions of each photograph being processed

photo_timestamps.description: Timestamps when each photo was taken

camera_info.description: Camera or device information used for photography

lighting_conditions.description: Lighting conditions when photos were taken

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Incident ID must correspond to an existing investigation case.
Mismatched arrays: Photo descriptions and timestamps arrays must have equal length.
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Photo descriptions insufficient: Each photo must have a meaningful description.
Camera information missing: Specify camera model or device used for evidence integrity.
Too many photos: Maximum 50 photos can be processed in single batch.
usage: Provide incident_id, photographer_name, photo_descriptions array, photo_timestamps array, and camera_info. Optionally specify lighting_conditions. Arrays must have matching lengths.

photo_evidence_ids.description: Unique identifiers assigned to each processed photo

processing_timestamp.description: When photos were processed into evidence system

metadata_extracted.description: Whether technical metadata was successfully extracted

integrity_verified.description: Whether photo integrity and authenticity was verified
